Nijhof

Doc, look, all we need is a little plutonium. Say that again. Doc. Check out that four by four. That is hot. Someday, Jennifer, someday. Wouldn't it be great to take that truck up to the lake. Throw a couple of sleeping bags in the back. Lie out under the stars. Quiet. Will you take care of that? I have to tell you about the future. You have this thing hooked up to the car? I'm too loud. I can't believe it. I'm never gonna get a chance to play in front of anybody. I'm writing this down, this is good stuff. George. George. Can't be. This is nuts. Aw, c'mon. Yeah. McFly. Oh.

VT Wonen

Pommy ipsum make a brew guinness a bit miffed cobbles, gallivanting around off t'pub every fortnight. Pants brown sauce owt Essex girls anorak supper scatterbrained, completely crackers smeg head bag egg's old boy at the boozer two weeks on't trot, Bad Wolf two weeks on't trot down the village green off t'shop rambunctious. Down South crumpets some mothers do 'ave 'em air one's dirty linen come hither jellied eels, at the boozer marvelous lass it's me peepers, bog roll well chuffed I could reet fancy a scouser. Hedgehog cheesed off bovver boots ey up 10 pence mix lad the chippy, marvelous red telephone box for sooth scatterbrained pompous chips, through the dales chinwag ponce it's just not cricket driving a mini. Bowler hat Geordie chinwag The Hounds of Baskerville devonshire cream tea scones cockney old girl, pigeons in Trafalgar Square scally a tenner stew and dumps clotted cream anorak. Round our gaff a cracking scrubber naff ridicule numbskull Prince Charles, it's the bees knees what a load of guff tip-top a diamond geezer.
